welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fethiye, a charming coastal town known for its stunning beaches, crystal-clear waters, and rich history. We hope you enjoy exploring all that this beautiful city has to offer and create unforgettable memories during your stay.

restaurants.name: Kahve Altı
restaurants.description: Kahve Altı is a café located in Fethiye.

restaurants.name: Çibörek ve Mantı Evi
restaurants.description: Çibörek ve Mantı Evi is a borek place located in Fethiye.
restaurants.address: Akarca Mah. 893 Sok. No:9/1 (devlet hastanesi acil karşısı), Fethiye, Muğla

restaurants.name: Lokum Kokoreç
restaurants.description: Lokum Kokoreç is a kokoreç restaurant located in Fethiye.
restaurants.address: Foça Mahallesi Yerguzlar Caddesi No:40/A, 48300 Fethiye

restaurants.name: Casero Kitchen
restaurants.description: Casero Kitchen is a italian restaurant located in Fethiye.

restaurants.name: Bazlama İstasyonu Çalış
restaurants.description: Bazlama İstasyonu Çalış is a fast food restaurant located in Fethiye.
restaurants.address: Yerguzlar Caddesi No: 29/1 Akarca Mahallesi (Yerguzlar Caddesi), 48300 Fethiye

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dalaman Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Dalaman Airport, used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
